```{r}
three_14 <- lang_1314[grep("^314", lang_1314$girlCode),]

three_14

three_14 <- three_14 %>%
    mutate("council" = "Gulfcoast Council") %>%
    mutate("langdiff" = finish - start)

three_14

```
